summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges incurred, including transportation and special handling fees, and provides a summary of the shipment's details, including pickup and delivery dates.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-747-08108, dated April 18, 2005.
Total charges for the shipment amounted to $78.14.
The shipment was picked up on April 4, 2005, and delivered on April 11, 2005.
A fuel surcharge of 6.12 was applied to the shipment.
Jeffrey Epstein's address is listed as 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843.
